Package projeto_pp

Class TaskImpl

java.lang.Object
projeto_pp.TaskImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<ma02_resources.project.Task>, ma02_resources.project.Task
public class TaskImpl extends Object implements ma02_resources.project.Task, Serializable
The TaskImpl class represents a task implementation with a title, description, start date, and duration. It implements the Task interface.
See Also:
